name: GARRY'S MOD MOBILE EDITION
description:
Hello Garry's Mod fans!

Garry's Mod is a physics sandbox. There aren't any predefined aims or goals. We give you the tools and leave you to play.

You spawn objects and weld them together to create your own contraptions - whether that's a car, a rocket, a catapult or something that doesn't have a name yet - that's up to you.
developers: FASHION HAIR STUDIO KERESKEDELMI ES SZOLGALTATO BETETI TARSASAG
publishers: FASHION HAIR STUDIO KERESKEDELMI ES SZOLGALTATO BETETI TARSASAG
